DOC.brief_summary: This exploratory qualitative interview study conduct primary objective examining perception hold active military veteran regard help-seeking attitude mental health belief influence decision consent decline participation Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD ) Traumatic Brain Injury ( TBI ) clinical trial . Active duty military and/or veteran age 18 year old consent participate ( N = 50 ) , recently decline participation ( N = 50 ) , INTRuST affiliate outpatient clinical trial deployment-related PTSD TBI recruit . Participants consent participate INTRuST clinical trial ( Group 1 ) interview begin clinical trial , follow participation trial . Participants decline participation INTRuST affiliate outpatient clinical trial ( Group 2 ) interview . For participant group , study participation initiate within 1 month referral study . Total duration study participation base specific clinical trial participant recruitment ; long trial estimate 24 week less . Semi-structured qualitative individual interview conduct carry thematic analysis data explore familial , social institution-level construct may influence subjective experience research treatment process .
DOC.brief_title: Patient Participation Beliefs Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder ( PTSD )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 2 . Active duty and/or veteran 3 . Referred participate INTRuSTaffiliated outpatient clinical trial PTSD TBI 4 . Ability provide write informed consent
